items.name: init(title: INSpeakableString, tasks: [INTask], groupName: INSpeakableString?, createdDateComponents: DateComponents?, modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?, identifier: String?)
items.desc: Initializes the task list object with the specified content.

items.name: var title: INSpeakableString
items.desc: The title text for the task list.

items.name: var tasks: [INTask]
items.desc: The array of individual tasks to perform.

items.name: var groupName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: The user-visible name of the group that contains the task list.

items.name: var createdDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The creation date of the task list.

items.name: var modifiedDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The date on which the intent most recently modified the task list.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The unique identifier that you use to identify the task list internally.
